targets.expr: sum(rate(registry_storage_operation_execution_seconds_sum{application="$registryName", status="success", instance=~"$instance"}[3m])) by (operation) / sum(rate(registry_storage_operation_execution_seconds_count{application="$registryName", status="success", instance=~"$instance"}[3m])) by (operation)

sum(rate(registry_storage_operation_execution_seconds_sum{application="$registryName", status="success", instance=~"$instance"}[3m])) by (operation) / sum(rate(registry_storage_operation_execution_seconds_count{application="$registryName", status="success", instance=~"$instance"}[3m])) by (operation)
sum(registry_storage_operation_execution_seconds_count{application="$registryName", status="fail", instance=~"$instance", code!~"400|401|403|404|422"}) by (operation, code, schema)

sum(rate(registry_storage_operation_execution_seconds_sum{application="$registryName", status="success", instance=~"$instance"}[2m])) by (schema, operation) / sum(rate(registry_storage_operation_execution_seconds_count{application="$registryName", status="success", instance=~"$instance"}[2m])) by (schema, operation)

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$registryName", instance=~"$instance"}[2m])) by (method, uri) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$registryName", instance=~"$instance"}[2m])) by (method, uri)
